reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: travelled on the 1st March 2009.I had booked this trip through Thomas Cook to fly from east midlands airport.I was not informed at the time of booking that TC did not fly to Egypt but they sub the flight out to Jet2.com.If I had wanted to fly budget airlines I would have booked it myself.So needless to say that both flights were a nightmare,uncomfortable,no entertainment on board(as advertised in the brochure),although the staff were very good.The only good point was that after declining to pay for inflight food at time of booking,we still given the inflight meal.
reviews.title: not great,struggles to be a 4 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The trip through the airport was painless enough(although for you smokers beware,if want a quick fag before your cases arrive,once you leave the airport to go outside,you can not re-enter the building as my wife found out)
reviews.title: Not 5 star......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival at the hotel,we were given registration forms to fill out and than to take to reception to check in.This is the first time,we have not been offered a welcoming drink at any hotel we have been too and after travelling all day,its just a nice touch. had also paid for a room upgrade which was a waste of money as all of the rooms were the same.Our friends who travelled with us(seperate booking) checked in at the same as me and the Gent on reception said he had given us both a free upgrade but yet our rooms were identical.The room was large and very dated.Although the room was clean,the furniture and the carpet had seen better days,both were covered in stains and after sitting on the furniture both my wife and I felt very itchy and came out in a rash.
reviews.title: Very happy stay at the Grand Azure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Food in the buffet style resturaunt wasn`t bad although there was a staff canteen feel to the place ...no tablecloths ,laid up tables etc...however the a la carte options were much better,7pm or 9pm sittings...the service was extremelly rushed.
reviews.title: The good, the bad and the ugly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The Tropicana eatery nearer to the beach has lovely freshly made pizzas but ther was an inquisition if you wanted to go back for more food? in fact I must say that where the food and drink is concerned I have never been to such a tight hotel...they certainly do not want you to get more than than the minimum.
reviews.title: Superb hotel with extra superb service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the good things have been said so I would lile to add the down side that some peopleshould know. The Azure is a great hotel but if you are slightly disabled and cannot walk far or climb steps then stay away from the Azure.It's amazing that in all those wonderful reviews no one mentions that the hotel is built on a steep incline and therefore has many levels with many steps.There are slopes for wheel chairs but a couple of these are very steep and I witnessed a chair user having difficulties.
reviews.title: A great hotel but......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a Tut Tut road train which runs around the perimeter of the hotel(service road)every 1/2hour but this finishes at 4.30pm.therefore isolating us from the Lobby bar and speciality restaurants as we were way down in block 2,Fountain pool area which is approx. 1000metres from the reception lobby.
reviews.title: couldn't fault it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One last rant ,when you walk from the lobby towards the Waterfalls pool at night the view is stunning as hundreds of palm trees have uplights fitted,pity there isn't any downlights on walkway paths,lighting is very poor and some peaple were using torches,steps are also very badly lit. Hope this is some help to some people.
reviews.title: A faultless Holiday even if the water was cold!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: fantastic holiday. all the staff were so happy and kind nothing was too much trouble. security very good. the food was excellent and the choice amazing. food hygiene was first class. so many places to eat and drink, pools and gardens areas very well kept. lovely beach, beautiful sea with plenty of fish to admire. rooms kept very clean and fresh sheets and towels daily. it was amazing to wake up to sunshine daily. we did here people complaining about the food but very unfounded because there was something for every taste. the evening entertainment was poor but maybe that was because we were out of season but it suited us. would definitely go again
reviews.title: The Tropicana Grand Azure Resort does not fail to deliver

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent a great week at the hotel - what can I say? Marvellous experience from the time we were upgraded on arrival to the courtesy meal and drinks after checking out while waiting for our transport to the airport.
reviews.title: loved tropicana grand azure

likes.disliked: — wouldnt say it was 5 star there was lack of attention in some areas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: have just come back and had a great time. staff are very friendly and helpful, very clean.
reviews.title: we will be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009
reviews.text: great not to have to pack beach towels as they are supplied by the hotel for the beach and the pools, also no need to pack shampoo and shower gel as these are also supplied. bar terrace could do with a bit more lighting. the airport very chaotic and this needs addressing otherwise tourists will stay away
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just home from the tropicana grand azure resort, sunday 22nd, and we had a fabulous time. Cleanliness, food, staff could not be faulted. We did tfind the evening entertainment a little bit lacking but even that wouldnt put us off going again.
reviews.title: beautiful hotel, we just both ended up poorly!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed at the tropicana grand azure for our honey moon.
reviews.title: Large, family friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: it is a beautiful hotel, the rooms were nice and big the reception gorgeous. Unfortunatly we both ended up very poorly, my husband on the 2nd night and me on our last. we were both ill for two weeks when we returned home.This put me off the hotel. I noticed drinks were being served with hands in the glasses and we are very hygiene conscious.
reviews.title: Superb hotel, staff, food and ammenities for the whole famly (inc teenagers)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a great hotel!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.disliked: — Small room (larger ones are available at a price)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for one week and had a great time. The hotel itself is located is Naqb Bay and in a great location. It has its own beach with sunbeds and a very long jetty out to the fish for snorkelling etc which is great.
reviews.title: Blown away - great holiday

likes.disliked: — the guys who hassle you ouside the hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is clean, the staff are great and cannot do enough to help. Our room was fine, slightly small but did the job as we were never really in there anyway.
reviews.title: brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: There are 3 bars open until 2am, and as much food as you can eat... the food was great by the way! If the buffet breakfast between 7-11 isnt enough, buffet lunch at 1-3, snacks at the beach 12-4, fresh pizza and pasta cooked in front of you also at the beach 1-4 then dinner 7-10. If you still got room then late dinner 12-1am!!
reviews.title: Faultless Absolutley Brilliant !!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Pools are great, 1 heated, the rest are freezing. Pool bars, aerobics, music at the pool...... had a great time. Definately recommend.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday
